p: For inhibited ROS production, MH treatment demonstrated the reduction of ROS production in dose-dependent manner comparing H 2O 2 treatment (231.8% ± 17.6%) [ Figure 5]. Interestingly, the MH (133.7% ± 10.3%) has a similar effect comparing to hispidulin treatment (132.5% ± 10.6%). Taken together, the MH and hispidulin treatment alone did not show any negative effect in the neuronal cells.
